Package ojc.bain.neuron.rate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClampedLinearNeuronCollection
    Implements neurons that pass through received input, but chop-off values below 0 or above 1.
    LinearNeuronCollection
    Implements neurons that simply pass through received input.
    NeuronCollectionWithBias<C extends NeuronConfiguration>
    A base for (typically rate-based encoding type) neurons that include a bias in the activation.
    SigmoidNeuronCollection
    Implements rate-based neurons that use a Sigmoidal activation function.
    SigmoidNeuronConfiguration
    Configuration for SigmoidNeuronCollection.
